name: ecosystem_health_check
description: Token ecosystem health check for any token on Base chain. Analyzes liquidity, price action, trading volume, pair age, and returns a health score (0-100) with risk flags. Powered by DEXScreener token data. Returns structured JSON for agents and a human-readable summary for Butler users. Keywords: token health, risk analysis, liquidity, DEX metrics.

tokenAddress.description: Token contract address on Base chain (0x...)
